text: I’m trying to use the NBodySimulator, especially the GravitationalSystem. I don’t know what units the MassBody takes for the location, velocity and mass. Maybe m, m/s, and kg? I’d like to model the solar system.

elements.text: I’m trying to use the NBodySimulator, especially the GravitationalSystem. I don’t know what units the MassBody takes for the location, velocity and mass. Maybe m, m/s, and kg? I’d like to model the solar system.

text: I suspect it's a case of, you get what you plug in. SI units in, SI units out.

elements.text: I suspect it's a case of, you get what you plug in. SI units in, SI units out.

text: I could also start from the other end and try to plug in values. I’ll need the position in relation to the Sun, speed, and weight of each planet. It would make sense that this data is located somewhere, and I’ll just need to find it.

elements.text: I could also start from the other end and try to plug in values. I’ll need the position in relation to the Sun, speed, and weight of each planet. It would make sense that this data is located somewhere, and I’ll just need to find it.

text: Speed I can get from the orbital period, but I’ll need to read that from someplace.
